d545c021-a730-4a9d-b59d-17f890042119.name: Diffuse
d545c021-a730-4a9d-b59d-17f890042119.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

fb80dab4-829a-4d6e-90c8-20dfae99eede.name: Homogenous
fb80dab4-829a-4d6e-90c8-20dfae99eede.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

0b272435-2c55-4e9e-a2db-d2c1e60929b8.name: No Blood
0b272435-2c55-4e9e-a2db-d2c1e60929b8.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

b9dfe37c-92f4-4ab9-849c-df5d8ff943a4.name: No Brain
b9dfe37c-92f4-4ab9-849c-df5d8ff943a4.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

74afa206-c4c5-48a8-b244-0b842ff1f9fc.name: No Eyes
74afa206-c4c5-48a8-b244-0b842ff1f9fc.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

dac2d891-6dda-4d42-b2e6-ee9d857a3ca5.name: No Head
dac2d891-6dda-4d42-b2e6-ee9d857a3ca5.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

e6d176d1-9fb5-44db-809e-c234cedbfb3b.name: No Neck
e6d176d1-9fb5-44db-809e-c234cedbfb3b.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

cc45225e-b27b-4d2f-afb2-dd39334085a6.name: No Vitals
cc45225e-b27b-4d2f-afb2-dd39334085a6.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

c61aabce-1705-4836-863e-308662010af7.name: Unliving
c61aabce-1705-4836-863e-308662010af7.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
